#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() 
{
	int n,t,i,count,max,a[100001];
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	    max=INT_MIN;
	    count=1;
	    cin>>n;
	    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	    cin>>a[i];
	    sort(a,a+n);
	    for(i=0;i<n-1;i++)
	    {
	    if(a[i]==a[i+1])
	    count++;
	    else
	    count=1;
	    if(count>max)
	    max=count;
	    }
	    cout<<max<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
